short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR codes from text or URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InstaQR, your ultimate Chrome extension for rapid QR code generation, brings you a hassle-free experience for quick and straightforward information sharing on the web.

Key Features:

üöÄ Instant QR Creation: Generate QR codes with a single click, ensuring swift and seamless execution.

üåê Universal Compatibility: InstaQR supports various QR code types, making it ideal for URLs, text, contacts, and more.

üí° User-Friendly Interface: InstaQR features a clean and intuitive interface, making QR code creation accessible to everyone, from tech enthusiasts to casual users.

üöö Swift Sharing Options: Share your QR codes instantly. Copy to clipboard, download as an image, or share the link seamlessly.

Whether you're a professional, student, or tech enthusiast, InstaQR is your go-to tool for enhancing productivity and streamlining information sharing. Install now and experience the speed and efficiency of InstaQR in every click!

Developed by: Ali Saeed (Lead), Omar Khan & Muaaz Mohammed (Co-Leads)
